metadata.title: CVE-2025-1017 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 134, Thunderbird 134, Firefox ESR128.6, and Thunderbird 128.6. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memorycorruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could havebeen exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox <135, Firefox ESR < 128.7, Thunderbird < 128.7, and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
